name: Dark Google Plus Theme (CSharpner)
description:
A Google+ Dark Theme derived from Rintan's theme here: https://userstyles.org/styles/153456/dark-google-plus-theme

I've updated it to darken the search bar on the home page and on the communities page, darken buttons and add contrast on them to make them readable, and darkened the whole new post box and collections selector.

user.name: csharpner
user.about:
I've been developing software my whole life.  Making themes is a new, side hobby of mine.  I prefer dark themes because they incur less strain on my eyes, drain less power from my mobile devices, and just plain look better (to me, anyway).

I accept donations via BitCoin:
